about_the_game:
The world of Birthdays the Beginning allows you to embark on your very own creative adventure, and what better way to do so than to have the music playing while you explore the real world? With beautiful ambient music that encourage you to delve deeper into the meaning of life and the world around you, this digital soundtrack is the perfect addition to your music library!

The Birthdays the Beginning Digital Soundtrack includes 32 tracks!
detailed_description:

With beautiful ambient music that encourage you to delve deeper into the meaning of life and the world around you, this digital soundtrack is the perfect addition to your music library!

short_description: Immerse yourself in the beautiful melodies of Birthdays the Beginning with this gorgeous collection of music from the game! From calm, subtle sounds to exciting tunes that mimic the growth of life around you, this digital soundtrack is the perfect addition to your music library!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
